event.title: was named the Oklahoma state Boys' Basketball Player of the Year for 1978

data.event: Center Eddie Louie was named the Oklahoma state Boys' Basketball Player of the Year for 1978.

event.title: ’s Boys' Basketball Coach of the Year in 1978

data.event: Jim Knapp, New Lima long time coach, won the state’s Boys' Basketball Coach of the Year in 1978; he also won the title in 1973.
Jim Knapp, New Lima long time coach, won the state’s Boys' Basketball Coach of the Year in 1978; he also won the title in 1973.

event.title: led the team to the state’s Tournament of Champions Champion earlier that season

data.event: Louie also led the team to the state’s Tournament of Champions Champion earlier that season.
The Oklahoman named the 1978 New Lima Boys Basketball team as the #24 "best in sports," noting, "1978 New Lima boys basketball: 31-0.
